Eric Roos

Eric grew up in Schulenburg, TX and moved to Dallas in 2014 after receiving his undergrad in Computer Science from Baylor University. He now is a software engineer for Teladoc Health. Eric loves travelling side by side with Zack and is constantly looking forward to the next city or mountain escape. His two favorite trips with Zack was the first time in Colarado where we drove the mountains in a lime green Kia Soul. And the surprise engagement trip to New York City.

Zack Thomas

Zack grew up in Blooming Grove TX and moved to Dallas in 2014 after receiving his Bachelors in Excerise Sports Science from Texas State University. Zack has done a lot in Dallas: ranging from Cycle Studio Manager, to Oil & Gas Logistics, to now helping his clients find and purchase the home of their dreams as a buyer's agent for the Dallas Native team here in DFW. Zack loves the gym and travelling with Eric and friends. Zack's favorite moment with Eric was that first trip to Colorado in 2015.

Our Story

Featured People

Justin Riddle

Best Man

Justin Riddle is probably one of the most important people in Zack's life. Zack considers him a true brother. When things go wrong, Justin is there. When things go well, or good things happen, Justin is there or the one pulling the strings. Justin has always been the number 1 supporter for Zack and Eric and the day would not be complete without him.

Laura Frye

Bridesmaid

Laura is a Teacher for Austin ISD. Her and Zack met during their time together at Texas State. Laura is always a calming presence to the group and has always stood by Zack and Eric's side as individuals, friends, and a couple.

Marisa Soto

Bridesmaid

Marisa was one of the first friends Zack made at Texas State. Living in Bexar hall together, Marisa and Zack got and remained extremely close. While Marisa lives a good bit away in Del Rio coaching, she has always been there as a close friend to Zack and Eric.

Johnna Smith

Bridesmaid

Johnna is a childhood friend that has remained one of Zack's closest friends growing up and to this day. Johnna has always been the ride-or-die kind of friend to Zack and is always ready

Zane Thomas

Groomsmen

Youngest brother of Zack. Zane is finishing up a multitude of degrees from Texas A&M and will be pursuing a law degree in the near future.

Josh Watts

Best Man

One of Eric's closest friends he met while in Dallas. Technically Eric met Josh through Zack, while Josh worked at FlyWheel with Zack and soon became a roommate for a time being. After years have gone by Josh has remained one of the most loyal and close people in Eric's Dallas life.

Joshua Lichnovsky

Groosmen

Nephew of Eric. While he is technically his nephew, Joshua has always been more akin to a brother than nephew. Joshua and Eric spent every day afterschool together, did Highschool band together, and now will be celebrating the wedding at Eric's side.

Ann Marie Taylor

Bridesmaid

Ann Marie is someone Zack met while working as a manager for the Texas State Softball team. They became close during bullpen as Ann Marie was one of the star pitchers for the team.

Jacye Niemann

Officiant

Jacye is a long time college friend of Zack. Zack was the only wittness at Jacye's wedding and felt appropriate she be the one to marry him now.

Zeb Thomas

Groomsmen

Younger brother of Zack. Zeb is currently running a student housing apartment in Austin. Him and his dog Gunnar love exploring the outdoors that Austin provides.
